response.original_title: Coréia do Sul: Sucesso a todo Custo
response.overview: South Korea strives for excellence. It is there where the work shifts are longer and the school system is the most competitive. Everyone has success as their goal. However, even with the economy going well, unemployment taxes are growing - as well as the number of suicides, whose victims are the excluded and marginalised.
response.title: Coréia do Sul: Sucesso a todo Custo
